title: Library include does not store relative path
description: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer is not generating and saving the relative path correctly.
OB: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer does not generate and save the relative path correctly.
EB: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path correctly. For example, if the report design is located in $project/test, and a library is included from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary, the relative path should be stored accurately.
SR: To reproduce the issue, create a report design located in $project/test and include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary. Observe that the relative path is not saved correctly.
